pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ktch - A python package for model-based morphometrics[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/noshita/ktch/branch/main/graph/badge.svg?token=SJN66K7KJY)](https://codecov.io/gh/noshita/ktch)**ktch** is a python package for model-based morphometrics.## Licensektch is licensed under the Apache License, Version2.0
